    • SmartCalculator

      public SmartCalculator(double principal, double rate, int time, int number, double totalMarks, double obtainedMarks)
      Parameterized constructor to initialize fields with specified values.
      Parameters:
      principal - The principal amount for calculations.
      rate - The rate of interest for calculations.
      time - The time period for calculations.
      number - The total number of elements for mean calculation.
      totalMarks - The total marks for percentage calculation.
      obtainedMarks - The obtained marks for percentage calculation.
